all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And if you have not faith, hope, and charity, you can do nothing.
Doctrine and Covenants 18:19
Quote of the Day
"Prosperity, possessions, and ease constitute a potent mixture that can lead even the righteous to drink the spiritual poison of pride."
David A. Bednar | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
